purpose: Showcase and provide examples of AI applications using LLMs and RAG for various use cases.
principle: Leverages LLMs like OpenAI, Anthropic, and open-source models with RAG to enhance AI agent capabilities.
reusability: Offers a collection of examples and templates for building AI applications, facilitating learning and adaptation for different projects.
limitations: Primarily serves as a demonstration and educational resource; not intended for direct production use without customization.
name: awesome-llm-apps
description: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.
highlight: Comprehensive collection of AI agent implementations using various large language models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques.
